app.source.utils package¶

Submodules¶

app.source.utils.addAttribute module¶

addAttribute(filename: str, outputName='featureDataset.csv')[source]¶

This function add into the output file the features string and all the raws contained in the input file

Parameters

  • filename – input file name

  • outputName – output file name

Returns

name of the output file, now with all the raws

Return type

str

createFeatureString(numCols: int)[source]¶

This function generate the string “feature1,feature2,…,featureN,labels” where n=:numCols

Parameters

numCols – number of columns of the dataset

Returns

string “feature1,feature2,…,featureN,labels” where n=:numCols

Return type

str
